reviews.review_text: Excellent bbq wings and fast delivery. Will definitely order again.

The Donair and Hawaiian pizza with lemon pepper chicken wings are fire! So delicious! The only thing that I didn’t like about the pizza are the large slices of tomatoes on it. I would still give 5 stars regardless.

A lovely Airdronian recommended this restaurant to me, and I couldn’t be happier! The pizzas were piping hot, loaded with delicious toppings, and not greasy at all. My kids, who are notoriously picky about pizza, loved it. My husband raved about the golden wings and is already asking when we can go back for more. The prices were incredibly reasonable—I honestly couldn’t make the food for less at home!

What really sets this place apart, though, is the service. The staff are so friendly and helpful. It’s easy to see why people love this spot—we certainly do! We’ll definitely be regulars. Thank you so much for such a fantastic experience!

Pizza was delicious and was ready fast (only 15minutes after ordering)
We got the meat supreme and Hawaiian and loved both. Lots of toppings, good amount of cheese and wonderful crust!

I’ve tried to many places in Airdrie for wings and none of them are great. I came here to try the wings after reading some reviews. The owner asked me how I like my wings which I appreciated and they ended up being so good. I highly recommend the wings and I find the value good as well. I’ll be back!
The owner is amazing! The pizza is a great price and always meets the craving for good pizza! This place deserves all the love!
Best pizza and wing joint in town. I’ve been coming here for over 10 years. Johnny is awesome.
Great gluten free pizza, maybe even one of the best I've had! Lots of toppings and cheese-I'll definitely be back :)

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Best pizza ever! My 4-year-old can’t stop talking about it—he actually raves about how yummy it is. The crust is perfect, the toppings are always fresh, and the flavor is amazing every single time. Definitely our go-to spot for family pizza night!
Best pizza ever!

Never ordered from Johnny’s pizza until today. I saw all the good reviews on their gluten free pizza crust, so I decided to give it a try. And I was not disappointed! I’m new to the whole gluten free thing. Pizza is one of my favourite order out meals, so I was worried that it would be hard to find a good gluten free one. But Johnny’s gluten free crust was great!! It’s thin, but very crispy and delicious! Definitely recommend to all the gluten free peeps out there!
We love the food here! The pizza and wings are so good. Including the gluten free pizza!
Just ate there for the first time orderpizza and chicken wings food was hot very good sign pizza was tasty and wings where crispy
Fast, friendly, and always good!

Amazing pizza. Had a birthday party at spray park. Was so kind delivered to park even came in early to have pizzas for us before opening
Thanks again well be back❤️
good overall, pizza tasted good
I'm in town for work and always have a hesitation when ordering from new places. I ordered the loaded and it's a great pizza. Thank you
Went in to grab a quick slice. First time customer. Great pizza at a great price.!! I highly recommend this place.!!
The pickle pizza is divine! Gluten free crust is fantastic!
This is by far my favorite pizza spot in Airdrie.  Family run, and they are the most polite and welcoming people!  Love supporting this place!!  Keep up the great work!!!
